ygData.subject: ROLEPLAY!
ygData.msgSnippet: Geez people that think your chars are BORING! All people do it seems is just Draw, Kill, Loot, Draw, Kill, Loot, etc. It s much better to develop a piece of
ygData.messageBody:
Geez people that think your chars are BORING! All
people do it seems is just Draw, Kill, Loot, Draw, Kill,
Loot, etc. It's much better to develop a piece of
yourself into the character you made and bring it to life.
What would be even greater is to bunch a few friends
together and bring up an epic quest. Heck even beg the
GM's to help you with a good quest. Half the fun of
everquest it to roleplay, the other half is up to you (ex:
helping newbies, pissing others off :P) stuff like that.
